name: NFT_Tetris
description:
This game is a classic (retro) Tetris game, but with a lot more fun! Every time you play, a NFT (image) is chosen from a NFT API by LAY3RZ. Upon this, the game incorporates a certain mechanic for the gameplay. The NFT that is chosen will also be shown on the screen so you know what game mechanic you are dealing with!

Fireball = Start with a score of -100 

Mystery Box = Start with a score of 100

Winged Shoes = Sets the down arrow key to make the Tetrominoes  move extremely fast

Disco Ball = Normal Game

Hourglass = Sets the down arrow key to not work

Controls:

Up Arrow Key: Turns the Tetrominoe                                                                                                            Down Arrow Key: Moves the Tetrominoe down by 1 Extra block                                                Left/Right Arrow Key: Moves the Tetrominoe left/right                                                                      Space: Brings the Tetrominoe all the way to the bottom
